doc:
Ian Mercer https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ian_Mercer 0 Ian Clive Mercer (born 7 January 1961) is an English actor. He is known for playing Gary Mallett in the ITV soap opera Coronation Street from 1995 to 2000, having previously appeared in 1987 as a different character. His other television credits include Brookside (1982–83), Cracker (1993), and The Street (2007). Ian_Clive_Mercer ( born_7_January_1961 ) is an_English_actor . He is_known for playing Gary_Mallett in the_ITV_soap_opera_Coronation_Street from 1995 to 2000 , having_previously_appeared in 1987 as a_different_character . His_other_television_credits include Brookside_(_1982 – 83_) , Cracker_(_1993_) , and The_Street_(_2007_) .
